description:
See http://docs.rackspacecloud.com/servers/api/cs-bindguide-latest.pdf page 24.

This lets you specify files (e.g. /etc/banner.txt) that should be placed on the server to customize its image.

(Do we want to support this?  I thought I heard an argument about whether we wanted to support injecting files into images or not.)
title: Support <personality> when creating a server via API
